price: Bazabamo ubuziraherezo. Ntibazagira umurinzi cyangwa umutabazi.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
